entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28 with temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 28 with temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
